## Find content items by tag

A tag identifier is required to find content items.

::: {.panel-tabset group="language"}

### Python

```{python}
TAG_ID = "200"

response = client.get(f"/v1/tags/{TAG_ID}/content")
content_items = response.json()
print(content_items)
```

```{json}
[
    {
        "guid": "95f0b367-0eb5-4a8f-a9a8-4a531f00f712",
        ...
    },
]
```

## Find tags by content item

A content item identifier is required to find tags.

::: {.panel-tabset group="language"}

### Python

```{python}
CONTENT_ITEM_GUID = "95f0b367-0eb5-4a8f-a9a8-4a531f00f712"

response = client.get(f"/v1/content/{CONTENT_ITEM_GUID}/tags")
tags = response.json()
print(tags)
```
